## PR Checklist

- [ ] CI green (build, lint, tests)
- [ ] Minimal diffs; no API breaks without tests/migration notes
- [ ] Security: no privilege escalation in Actions; deps scanned
- [ ] Docs updated (README/CHANGELOG) if behavior changes
- [ ] Valuation docs (if touched) keep pre-revenue / pre-publication / pre-patent language

### Type of Change
<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code quality improvement (refactoring, formatting, etc.)
- [ ] CI/CD improvement
